availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard Troutman (Nelson County, KY; multiple candidates)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Troutman and Mary Hill Troutman. Married to Katherine “Katie” Nicholls Troutman in Nelson County on February 2, 1858. Preparatory student at Hanover College in Indiana in 1849. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850. Household owned twenty-six enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860. Farmer in Nelson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 312B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 185, p. 20 of microfilm.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, p. 16.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, p. 128A.
Second Triennial Catalogue of Hanover College, Hanover, Indiana, for the Year 1849, E. F. Foster, Franklin Printing Rooms, 1849, p. 7.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film #000481488, p. 125.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 4th Congressional District, Vol. 2, 1863, p. 490, p. 193 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on April 21, 2020).
Find A Grave, "Leonard Troutman (1827-1865)," Memorial 23005619, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/23005619 (accessed April 20, 2020).
